item.title: Databricks Cheatsheet
item.description: h1 General Shortcut Description Ctrl + / Multiline comment Cmd + / Toggle line comment h1 Spark Dataframe Shortcut Description df.head() returns first few rows of a dataframe df.count() returns count of non null values of all columns in a dataframe
